thread.title: Futura Links With Medicom Toy for New Marble Be@rbrick Set
thread.title_full: Futura Links With Medicom Toy for New Marble Be@rbrick Set

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Futura Links With Medicom Toy for New Marble Be@rbrick Set
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Following news of an impending collaboration with Uniqlo UT , now we find Futura once again alongside Medicom Toy for a new set of marble Be@rbricks.
Over-top the marble backdrop, Futura’s signature street style patterns and shades further liven up the figurine, in addition to his autograph on both 100% and 400% size options.
The Be@rbrick set arrives in a matching box, also welcoming the artist’s signature.
You can snag the Futura x Medicom Toy Be@rbrick package today through the UK’s END. for $179 USD.
